egressConfiguration.description: Network configuration settings for outbound message traffic. See Egress Configuration below for more details.

ingressConfiguration.description: Network configuration settings for inbound network traffic. See Ingress Configuration below for more details.

ipAddressType.description: App Runner provides you with the option to choose between Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) and dual stack (IPv4 and IPv6) for your incoming public network configuration. Valid values: `IPV4`, `DUAL_STACK`. Default: `IPV4`.
